text: This is a list of rivers that are at least partially in France. The rivers are grouped by sea or ocean. In French, rivers are called fleuves when they flow into the sea (or into a desert or lake). They are called rivières when they flow into another river. The fleuves are shown in bold. ==List of rivers== ===North Sea=== The rivers in this section are sorted north-east (Netherlands) to south-west (Calais). * Rhine/Rhin (main branch at Hoek van Holland,
